      • SCHEMA_REGISTRY_URL

        public static final ConfigEntry<String> SCHEMA_REGISTRY_URL
        URL of schema registry to which this client connects to. For ex: http://localhost:9090/api/v1

        public static final long DEFAULT_CLASSLOADER_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS
        Default value for cache expiry interval in seconds.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CLASSLOADER_CACHE_SIZE

        public static final ConfigEntry<Number> CLASSLOADER_CACHE_SIZE
        Maximum size of classloader cache. Default value is DEFAULT_CLASSLOADER_CACHE_SIZE Classloaders are created for serializer/deserializer jars downloaded from schema registry and they will be locally cached.

      • CLASSLOADER_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS

        public static final ConfigEntry<Number> CLASSLOADER_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS
        Expiry interval(in seconds) of an entry in classloader cache. Default value is DEFAULT_CLASSLOADER_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS Classloaders are created for serializer/deserializer jars downloaded from schema registry and they will be locally cached.

      • DEFAULT_SCHEMA_CACHE_SIZE

        public static final long DEFAULT_SCHEMA_CACHE_SIZE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_SCHEMA_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS

        public static final long DEFAULT_SCHEMA_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SCHEMA_VERSION_CACHE_SIZE

        public static final ConfigEntry<Number> SCHEMA_VERSION_CACHE_SIZE
        Maximum size of schema version cache. Default value is DEFAULT_SCHEMA_CACHE_SIZE

      • SCHEMA_VERSION_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS

        public static final ConfigEntry<Number> SCHEMA_VERSION_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS
        Expiry interval(in seconds) of an entry in schema version cache. Default value is DEFAULT_SCHEMA_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS

      • SCHEMA_METADATA_CACHE_SIZE

        public static final ConfigEntry<Number> SCHEMA_METADATA_CACHE_SIZE
        Maximum size of schema metadata cache. Default value is DEFAULT_SCHEMA_CACHE_SIZE

      • SCHEMA_METADATA_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS

        public static final ConfigEntry<Number> SCHEMA_METADATA_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS
        Expiry interval(in seconds) of an entry in schema metadata cache. Default value is DEFAULT_SCHEMA_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS

      • SCHEMA_TEXT_CACHE_SIZE

        public static final ConfigEntry<Number> SCHEMA_TEXT_CACHE_SIZE
        Maximum size of schema text cache. Default value is DEFAULT_SCHEMA_CACHE_SIZE. This cache has ability to store/get entries with same schema name and schema text.

      • SCHEMA_TEXT_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS

        public static final ConfigEntry<Number> SCHEMA_TEXT_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS
        Expiry interval(in seconds) of an entry in schema text cache. Default value is DEFAULT_SCHEMA_CACHE_EXPIRY_INTERVAL_SECS
